column1: Little Goat Diner////From the moment we showed up I was in love
column2: the layout of the space is just delightful
column3: bright and airy. It's refreshing to be inside
column4: and the atmosphere puts you in a good mood. The team at Little Goat Diner was so welcoming too
column5: answering all of our questions about what to eat on the menu. And I'm glad we asked
